code: import{useSuspenseQuery}from'@tanstack/react-query';import{BASE_URL,fetchInstance}from'../instance';export const getProductDetailPath=productId=>"".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/products/").concat(productId);export const getProductDetail=async params=>{const response=await fetchInstance.get(getProductDetailPath(params.productId));return response.data;};export const useGetProductDetail=_ref=>{let{productId}=_ref;return useSuspenseQuery({queryKey:[getProductDetailPath(productId)],queryFn:()=>getProductDetail({productId})});};
